testcase.name: Bonito online bookstore searchbox
testcase.summary: The test case to check the Bonito online store searchbox funcionality
testcase.preconditions: The user should be connected to the Internet.

step.actions: Clicking magnifying glass icon without having typed anything into searchbox yet.
step.expectedresults:
1. Website reloaded (optional).
  2. Website not redirected anywhere. 
  3. No search results provided.
  4. Any info about empty searchbox provided to the User.

1. Result hints appear (e.w. pop up window, dropdown list). 
  2. One result hint equals one book title with author's name.
  3. A link / button to see all the results exists (e.g. "See all").
  4. Searched phrase (e.g. "Grisham") still visible in the searchbox.

step.actions: Clicking the button / link (e.g. See all) to redirect to the subpage with all the results.
step.expectedresults:
1. Subpage with all the results loaded.
  2. Info (header) about searched phrase provided (in this case: "Grisham)".
  3. Search results visible (book covers, images, author's names, book prices, info about availability, add to cart button).
  4. Pagination visible and active.

step.actions: Typing a random string (e.g. sdfgfghgfhsdfg) into searchbox.
step.expectedresults:
1. Info (header) about searched phrase provided (in this case: "sdfgfghgfhsdfg").
  2. Info (e.g. "no results" / "0 results") provided.
